description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Geology and industrial resources of California ... To which is added the official reports of Genls. Persifer, F. Smith, and B. Riley, including the reports of Lieuts. Talbot, Ord, Derby, and Williamson, of their explorations in California and Oregon; and also of their examinations of routes for railroad communication eastward from those countries" Author: TYSON, Philip T. Contributor: DERBY, George Horatio. Contributor: ORD, E. O. C. Contributor: RILEY, Bennet - General Contributor: TALBOT, Theodore. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7107.d.42." Page: 129 Place of Publishing: Baltimore Date of Publishing: 1851 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003699976 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
